annotation.title: NISAR L2 GCOV Product
annotation.reference_document: D-102274 NISAR NASA SDS Product Specification Level-2 Geocoded Polarimetric Covariance L2 GCOV

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/absoluteOrbitNumber
integer.annotation: Absolute orbit number

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/trackNumber
integer.annotation: Track number

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/frameNumber
integer.annotation: Frame number

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/missionId
string.annotation: Mission identifier

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingCenter
string.annotation: Data processing center

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productType
string.annotation: Product type

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/granuleId
string.annotation: Unique granule identification name

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productVersion
string.annotation: Product version which represents the structure of the product and the science content governed by the algorithm, input data, and processing parameters

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productSpecificationVersion
string.annotation: Product specification version which represents the schema of this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/lookDirection
string.annotation: Look direction, either "Left" or "Right"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/orbitPassDirection
string.annotation: Orbit direction, either "Ascending" or "Descending"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/zeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time of the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/zeroDopplerEndTime
string.annotation: Azimuth stop time of the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/plannedDatatakeId
string.annotation: List of planned datatakes included in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/plannedObservationId
string.annotation: List of planned observations included in the product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isUrgentObservation
string.annotation: Flag indicating if observation is nominal ("False") or urgent ("True")

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/listOfFrequencies
string.annotation: List of frequency layers available in the product

integer.name: /science/LSAR/identification/diagnosticModeFlag
integer.annotation: Indicates if the radar operation mode is a diagnostic mode (1-2) or DBFed science (0): 0, 1, or 2

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/productLevel
string.annotation: Product level. L0A: Unprocessed instrument data; L0B: Reformatted, unprocessed instrument data; L1: Processed instrument data in radar coordinates system; and L2: Processed instrument data in geocoded coordinates system

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isGeocoded
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the product data is in the radar geometry ("False") or in the map geometry ("True")

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/boundingPolygon
string.annotation: OGR compatible WKT representation of bounding polygon of the image

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingDateTime
string.annotation: Processing UTC date and time in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/radarBand
string.annotation: Acquired frequency band, either "L" or "S"

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/instrumentName
string.annotation: Name of the instrument used to collect the remote sensing data provided in this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/processingType
string.annotation: Nominal (or) Urgent (or) Custom (or) Undefined

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isDithered
string.annotation: "True" if the pulse timing was varied (dithered) during acquisition, "False" otherwise.

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/isMixedMode
string.annotation: "True" if this product is a composite of data collected in multiple radar modes, "False" otherwise.

string.name: /science/LSAR/identification/compositeReleaseId
string.annotation: Unique version identifier of the science data production system

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/listOfPolarizations
string.annotation: List of processed polarization layers with frequency A

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/listOfCovarianceTerms
string.annotation: List of processed covariance terms

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/yCoordinateSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal spacing in meters between consecutive lines

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/xCoordinateSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal spacing in meters between consecutive pixels

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/numberOfLooks
real.annotation: Number of averaged radar-grid pixels for covariance estimation

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/projection

annotation.false_easting: The value added to all abscissa values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.false_northing: The value added to all ordinate values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure
annotation.latitude_of_projection_origin: The latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.longitude_of_projection_origin: The longitude, with respect to Greenwich, of the prime meridian associated with the geodetic datum.

integer.annotation: Product map grid projection: EPSG code, with additional projection information as HDF5 Attributes

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/xCoordinates
real.annotation: X coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/yCoordinates
real.annotation: Y coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/rtcGammaToSigmaFactor
real.annotation: Radiometric terrain correction factor to normalize GCOV terms from gamma0 to sigma0

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/mask
integer.annotation: GCOV terms mask

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/HHHH
real.annotation: Covariance between HH and HH

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/HHHV
real.annotation: Covariance between HH and HV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/HHVH
real.annotation: Covariance betweeen HH and VH

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/HHVV
real.annotation: Covariance between HH and VV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/HVHV
real.annotation: Covariance between HV and HV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/HVVH
real.annotation: Covariance between HV and VH

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/HVVV
real.annotation: Covariance betweeen HH and VV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/VHVH
real.annotation: Covariance between VH and VH

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/VHVV
real.annotation: Covariance betweeen VH and VV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/VVVV
real.annotation: Covariance between VV and VV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/RHRH
real.annotation: Covariance between RH and RH

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/RHRV
real.annotation: Covariance between RH and RV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/RVRV
real.annotation: Covariance between RV and RV

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyA/numberOfSubSwaths
integer.annotation: Number of swaths of continuous imagery, due to transmit gaps

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/listOfPolarizations
string.annotation: List of processed polarization layers with frequency B

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/listOfCovarianceTerms
string.annotation: List of processed covariance terms

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/yCoordinateSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal spacing in meters between consecutive lines

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/xCoordinateSpacing
real.annotation: Nominal spacing in meters between consecutive pixels

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/projection

annotation.false_easting: The value added to all abscissa values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.false_northing: The value added to all ordinate values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure
annotation.latitude_of_projection_origin: The latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.longitude_of_projection_origin: The longitude, with respect to Greenwich, of the prime meridian associated with the geodetic datum.

integer.annotation: Product map grid projection: EPSG code, with additional projection information as HDF5 Attributes

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/xCoordinates
real.annotation: X coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/yCoordinates
real.annotation: Y coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/numberOfLooks
real.annotation: Number of averaged radar-grid pixels for covariance estimation

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/rtcGammaToSigmaFactor
real.annotation: Radiometric terrain correction factor to normalize GCOV terms from gamma0 to sigma0

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/mask
integer.annotation: GCOV terms mask

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/HHHH
real.annotation: Covariance between HH and HH

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/HHHV
real.annotation: Covariance between HH and HV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/HHVH
real.annotation: Covariance betweeen HH and VH

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/HHVV
real.annotation: Covariance between HH and VV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/HVHV
real.annotation: Covariance between HV and HV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/HVVH
real.annotation: Covariance between HV and VH

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/HVVV
real.annotation: Covariance betweeen HH and VV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/VHVH
real.annotation: Covariance between VH and VH

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/VHVV
real.annotation: Covariance betweeen VH and VV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/VVVV
real.annotation: Covariance between VV and VV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/RHRH
real.annotation: Covariance between RH and RH

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/RHRV
real.annotation: Covariance between RH and RV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/RVRV
real.annotation: Covariance between RV and RV

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/grids/frequencyB/numberOfSubSwaths
integer.annotation: Number of swaths of continuous imagery, due to transmit gaps

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/radarGrid/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range in meters

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/radarGrid/zeroDopplerAzimuthTime
real.annotation: Zero Doppler azimuth time in seconds

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/radarGrid/incidenceAngle
real.annotation: Incidence angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the target height

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/radarGrid/losUnitVectorX
real.annotation: East component of unit vector of LOS from target to sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/radarGrid/losUnitVectorY
real.annotation: North component of unit vector of LOS from target to sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/radarGrid/alongTrackUnitVectorX
real.annotation: East component of unit vector along ground track

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/radarGrid/alongTrackUnitVectorY
real.annotation: North component of unit vector along ground track

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/radarGrid/elevationAngle
real.annotation: Elevation angle is defined as the angle between the LOS vector and the normal to the ellipsoid at the sensor

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/radarGrid/groundTrackVelocity
real.annotation: Absolute value of the platform velocity scaled at the target height

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/radarGrid/projection

annotation.false_easting: The value added to all abscissa values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.false_northing: The value added to all ordinate values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure
annotation.latitude_of_projection_origin: The latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.longitude_of_projection_origin: The longitude, with respect to Greenwich, of the prime meridian associated with the geodetic datum.

integer.annotation: Product map grid projection: EPSG code, with additional projection information as HDF5 Attributes

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/radarGrid/xCoordinates
real.annotation: X coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/radarGrid/yCoordinates
real.annotation: Y coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/radarGrid/heightAboveEllipsoid
real.annotation: Height values above WGS84 Ellipsoid corresponding to the radar grid

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/crosstalk/txHorizontalCrosspol
real.annotation: Crosstalk in H-transmit channel expressed as ratio txV / txH

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/crosstalk/txVerticalCrosspol
real.annotation: Crosstalk in V-transmit channel expressed as ratio txH / txV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/crosstalk/rxHorizontalCrosspol
real.annotation: Crosstalk in H-receive channel expressed as ratio rxV / rxH

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/crosstalk/rxVerticalCrosspol
real.annotation: Crosstalk in V-recieve channel expressed as ratio rxH / rxV

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/commonDelay
real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to all polarimetric channels

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/faradayRotation
real.annotation: Faraday rotation correction applied in processing

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HH/differentialDelay
real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to HH channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HH/differentialPhase
real.annotation: Phase correction applied to HH channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HH/scaleFactor
real.annotation: Scale factor applied to HH channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyA/HH/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to HH channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

real.annotation: Phase correction applied to VV channel

real.annotation: Scale factor applied to VV channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/VV/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to VV channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/RH/differentialDelay
real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to RH channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/RH/differentialPhase
real.annotation: Phase correction applied to RH channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/RH/scaleFactor
real.annotation: Scale factor applied to RH channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/RH/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to RH channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/RV/differentialDelay
real.annotation: Range delay correction applied to RV channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/RV/differentialPhase
real.annotation: Phase correction applied to RV channel

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/RV/scaleFactor
real.annotation: Scale factor applied to RV channel complex amplitude (at antenna boresite)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/calibrationInformation/frequencyB/RV/scaleFactorSlope
real.annotation: Slope of scale factor applied to RV channel complex amplitude with respect to elevation angle

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/noiseCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if noise correction has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/preprocessingMultilookingApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if a preprocessing multilooking has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/polarizationOrientationCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the polarization orientation correction has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/faradayRotationApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the Faraday rotation correction has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/radiometricTerrainCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the radiometric terrain correction has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/dryTroposphericGeolocationCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the dry tropospheric correction has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/wetTroposphericGeolocationCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the wet tropospheric correction has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/rangeIonosphericGeolocationCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the range ionospheric correction has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/azimuthIonosphericGeolocationCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the azimuth ionospheric correction has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/rfiCorrectionApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if an RFI correction has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/postProcessingFilteringApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the post-processing filtering has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/isFullCovariance
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the product is full-covariance

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/validSamplesSubSwathMaskingApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the valid samples subswath masking has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/shadowMaskingApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the shadow masking has been applied

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/polarimetricSymmetrizationApplied
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the polarimetric symmetrization has been applied

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/preprocessing/frequencyA/numberOfRangeLooks
integer.annotation: Number of range looks applied to the RSLC before geocoding

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/preprocessing/frequencyA/numberOfAzimuthLooks
integer.annotation: Number of azimuth looks applied to the RSLC before geocoding

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/preprocessing/frequencyB/numberOfRangeLooks
integer.annotation: Number of range looks applied to the RSLC before geocoding

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/preprocessing/frequencyB/numberOfAzimuthLooks
integer.annotation: Number of azimuth looks applied to the RSLC before geocoding

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/rtc/inputBackscatterNormalizationConvention
string.annotation: Backscatter normalization convention of the source data

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/rtc/outputBackscatterNormalizationConvention
string.annotation: Backscatter normalization convention of the primary data associated with this product

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/rtc/outputBackscatterExpressionConvention
string.annotation: Backscatter expression convention

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/rtc/memoryMode
string.annotation: Radiometric terrain correction (RTC) memory mode

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/rtc/minRtcAreaNormalizationFactorInDB
real.annotation: Radiometric terrain correction (RTC) minimum area normalization factor value in dB computed as `10 * log10(area_out / area_in)` where `area_in` and `area_out` are the reference surfaces associated with the source data (input) and GCOV terms (output) backscatter conventions, respectively

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/rtc/geogridUpsampling
real.annotation: Radiometric terrain correction (RTC) geogrid upsampling

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geocoding/memoryMode
string.annotation: Geocoding memory mode

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geocoding/geogridUpsampling
real.annotation: Geocoding geogrid upsampling

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geocoding/minBlockSize
integer.annotation: Minimum block size in megabytes (MB) per thread

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geocoding/maxBlockSize
integer.annotation: Maximum block size in megabytes (MB) per thread

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geocoding/isSourceDataUpsampled
string.annotation: Flag to indicate if the source data is upsampled for geocoding

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geo2rdr/convergenceThreshold
real.annotation: Slant range convergence threshold for geo2rdr transformation

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geo2rdr/maxNumberOfIterations
integer.annotation: Maximum number of iterations for geo2rdr transformation

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/geo2rdr/deltaRange
real.annotation: Step size for computing numerical gradient of Doppler in meters for geo2rdr transformation

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/projection

annotation.false_easting: The value added to all abscissa values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.false_northing: The value added to all ordinate values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure
annotation.latitude_of_projection_origin: The latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.longitude_of_projection_origin: The longitude, with respect to Greenwich, of the prime meridian associated with the geodetic datum.

integer.annotation: Product map grid projection: EPSG code, with additional projection information as HDF5 Attributes

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/yCoordinates
real.annotation: Y coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/xCoordinates
real.annotation: X coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/referenceTerrainHeight
real.annotation: Reference Terrain Height as a function of map coordinates

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyA/projection

annotation.false_easting: The value added to all abscissa values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.false_northing: The value added to all ordinate values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure
annotation.latitude_of_projection_origin: The latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.longitude_of_projection_origin: The longitude, with respect to Greenwich, of the prime meridian associated with the geodetic datum.

integer.annotation: Product map grid projection: EPSG code, with additional projection information as HDF5 Attributes

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyA/yCoordinates
real.annotation: Y coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyA/xCoordinates
real.annotation: X coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler centroid for frequency A

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyB/projection

annotation.false_easting: The value added to all abscissa values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.false_northing: The value added to all ordinate values in the rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.inverse_flattening: Inverse flattening of the ellipsoidal figure
annotation.latitude_of_projection_origin: The latitude chosen as the origin of rectangular coordinates for a map projection.
annotation.longitude_of_projection_origin: The longitude, with respect to Greenwich, of the prime meridian associated with the geodetic datum.

integer.annotation: Product map grid projection: EPSG code, with additional projection information as HDF5 Attributes

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyB/yCoordinates
real.annotation: Y coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyB/xCoordinates
real.annotation: X coordinates in specified projection

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyB/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler centroid for frequency B

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/parameters/runConfigurationContents
string.annotation: Contents of the run configuration file with parameters used for processing

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/demInterpolation
string.annotation: DEM interpolation method

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/geocoding
string.annotation: Geocoding algorithm

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/radiometricTerrainCorrection
string.annotation: Radiometric terrain correction (RTC) algorithm

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/rfiCorrection
string.annotation: RFI correction algorithm

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/polarimetricSymmetrization
string.annotation: Polarimetric symmetrization algorithm

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/radiometricTerrainCorrectionAlgorithmReference
string.annotation: Reference to the radiometric terrain correction (RTC) algorithm applied (if applicable)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/geocodingAlgorithmReference
string.annotation: Reference to the geocoding algorithm applied (if applicable)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/orbit/referenceEpoch
string.annotation: Reference epoch in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS.SSS

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/orbit/interpMethod
string.annotation: Orbit interpolation method, either "Hermite" or "Legendre"

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/orbit/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time corresponding to position and velocity records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/orbit/position
real.annotation: Position vector record. This record contains the platform position data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/orbit/velocity
real.annotation: Velocity vector record. This record contains the platform velocity data with respect to WGS84 G1762 reference frame

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/orbit/orbitType
string.annotation: Orbit product type, either "FOE", "NOE", "MOE", "POE", or "Custom", where "FOE" stands for Forecast Orbit Ephemeris, "NOE" is Near real-time Orbit Ephemeris, "MOE" is Medium precision Orbit Ephemeris, and "POE" is Precise Orbit Ephemeris

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/attitude/time
real.annotation: Time vector record. This record contains the time corresponding to attitude and quaternion records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/attitude/quaternions
real.annotation: Attitude quaternions (q0, q1, q2, q3)

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/attitude/eulerAngles
real.annotation: Attitude Euler angles (roll, pitch, yaw)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/attitude/attitudeType
string.annotation: Attitude type, either "FRP", "NRP", "PRP, or "Custom", where "FRP" stands for Forecast Radar Pointing, "NRP" is Near Real-time Pointing, and "PRP" is Precise Radar Pointing

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/algorithms/softwareVersion
string.annotation: Software version used for processing

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/l1SlcGranules
string.annotation: List of input L1 RSLC products used

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/orbitFiles
string.annotation: List of input orbit files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/tecFiles
string.annotation: List of input total electron content (TEC) files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/configFiles
string.annotation: List of input config files used

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/processingInformation/inputs/demSource
string.annotation: Description of the input digital elevation model (DEM)

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/productVersion
string.annotation: Product version of the source data

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/lookDirection
string.annotation: Look direction, either "Left" or "Right"

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/productLevel
string.annotation: Source data product level. Product level. L0A: Unprocessed instrument data; L0B: Reformatted, unprocessed instrument data; L1: Processed instrument data in radar coordinates system; and L2: Processed instrument data in geocoded coordinates system

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingDateTime
string.annotation: Source data processing UTC date and time in the format YYYY-mm-ddTHH:MM:SS

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/runConfigurationContents
string.annotation: Contents of the run configuration file associated with the processing of the source data

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/referenceTerrainHeight
real.annotation: Reference terrain height corresponding to the source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero doppler time dimension corresponding to source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range dimension corresponding to source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyA/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero doppler time dimension corresponding to source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyA/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range dimension corresponding to the source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyA/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler centroid for frequency A corresponding to the source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyB/zeroDopplerTime
real.annotation: Zero doppler time dimension corresponding to source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyB/slantRange
real.annotation: Slant range dimension corresponding to source data processing information records

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/parameters/frequencyB/dopplerCentroid
real.annotation: 2D LUT of Doppler centroid for frequency B corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/rfiDetection
string.annotation: Algorithm used for radio frequency interference (RFI) detection corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/rfiMitigation
string.annotation: Algorithm used for radio frequency interference (RFI) mitigation corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/rangeCompression
string.annotation: Algorithm for focusing the data in the range direction corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/elevationAntennaPatternCorrection
string.annotation: Algorithm for calibrating the antenna pattern corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/rangeSpreadingLossCorrection
string.annotation: Algorithm for calibrating range fading corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/dopplerCentroidEstimation
string.annotation: Algorithm for calculating Doppler centroid corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/azimuthPresumming
string.annotation: Algorithm for regridding and filling gaps in the raw data in azimuth corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/azimuthCompression
string.annotation: Algorithm for focusing the data in the azimuth direction corresponding to the source data processing information records

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/processingInformation/algorithms/softwareVersion
string.annotation: Software version used for processing the source data

string.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/swaths/zeroDopplerStartTime
string.annotation: Azimuth start time of the source data product

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/swaths/zeroDopplerTimeSpacing
real.annotation: Time interval in the along-track direction of the source data in seconds

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/swaths/numberOfAzimuthLines
integer.annotation: Number of azimuth lines within the source data product

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/rangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Source data processed range bandwidth in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/azimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Source data processed azimuth bandwidth in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/centerFrequency
real.annotation: Center frequency of the processed source data image in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/slantRangeStart
real.annotation: Source data slant range start distance

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of the source data in meters

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyA/numberOfRangeSamples
integer.annotation: Number of slant range samples for each azimuth line within the source data

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/rangeBandwidth
real.annotation: Source data processed range bandwidth in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/azimuthBandwidth
real.annotation: Source data processed azimuth bandwidth in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/centerFrequency
real.annotation: Center frequency of the processed source data image in hertz

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/slantRangeStart
real.annotation: Source data slant range start distance

real.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/slantRangeSpacing
real.annotation: Slant range spacing of the source data in meters

integer.name: /science/LSAR/GCOV/metadata/sourceData/swaths/frequencyB/numberOfRangeSamples
integer.annotation: Number of slant range samples for each azimuth line within the source data

shape.name: scalar
shape.annotation: scalar values

shape.name: numberOfDatatakes
shape.annotation: number of datatakes in product

shape.name: numberOfObservations
shape.annotation: number of observations in product

shape.name: numberOfFrequencies
shape.annotation: Number of L-SAR frequencies in product

shape.name: numberOfFrequencyAPolarizations
shape.annotation: Number of polarization layers associated with L-SAR frequency A

shape.name: numberOfFrequencyACovarianceTerms
shape.annotation: Number of covariance terms associated with L-SAR frequency A

shape.name: frequencyAWidth
shape.annotation: Number of pixels in all L-SAR frequency A imagery datasets

shape.name: frequencyALength
shape.annotation: Number of lines in all L-SAR frequency A imagery datasets

shape.name: complexDataFrequencyAShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with L-SAR frequency A complex-valued imagery datasets

shape.name: realDataFrequencyAShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with L-SAR frequency A real-valued imagery datasets

shape.name: numberOfFrequencyBPolarizations
shape.annotation: Number of polarization layers associated with L-SAR frequency B

shape.name: numberOfFrequencyBCovarianceTerms
shape.annotation: Number of covariance terms associated with L-SAR frequency B

shape.name: frequencyBWidth
shape.annotation: Number of pixels in all L-SAR frequency B imagery datasets

shape.name: frequencyBLength
shape.annotation: Number of lines in all L-SAR frequency B imagery datasets

shape.name: complexDataFrequencyBShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with L-SAR frequency B complex-valued imagery datasets

shape.name: realDataFrequencyBShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with L-SAR frequency B real-valued imagery datasets

shape.name: radarGridShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with 2D rasters on same grid as metadata cubes

shape.name: radarCubeShape
shape.annotation: Shape associated with metadata cubes

shape.name: radarCubeHeight
shape.annotation: Height dimension of the metadata cube

shape.name: radarCubeLength
shape.annotation: Length dimension of the metadata cube

shape.name: radarCubeWidth
shape.annotation: Width dimension of the metadata cube

shape.name: dopplerCentroidLength
shape.annotation: Length dimension of Doppler centroid grid

shape.name: dopplerCentroidWidth
shape.annotation: Length dimension of Doppler centroid grid

shape.name: dopplerCentroidShape
shape.annotation: Shape of the Doppler centroid grid

shape.name: calibrationLength
shape.annotation: Length of calibration LUTs

shape.name: calibrationWidth
shape.annotation: Width of calibration LUTs

shape.name: calibrationScaleShape
shape.annotation: Shape of calibration LUTs

shape.name: antennaPatternComplexShape
shape.annotation: Shape of antenna pattern datasets

shape.name: crosstalkComplexShape
shape.annotation: Shape of crosstalk datasets

shape.name: dopplerCentroidTimeLength
shape.annotation: Length dimension of Doppler centroid grid

shape.name: dopplerCentroidSlantRangeWidth
shape.annotation: Length dimension of Doppler centroid grid

shape.name: dopplerCentroidShape
shape.annotation: Shape of the Doppler centroid grid

shape.name: orbitListLength
shape.annotation: Number of orbit state vectors

shape.name: orbitShape
shape.annotation: Shape of orbit state vector triplets dataset

shape.name: attitudeListLength
shape.annotation: Number of attitude state vectors

shape.name: attitudeQuaternionShape
shape.annotation: Shape of attitude quaternion dataset

shape.name: attitudeShape
shape.annotation: Shape of attitude Euler angle triplets dataset

shape.name: numberOfInputL1Files
shape.annotation: Number of input L1 granules

shape.name: numberOfInputOrbitFiles
shape.annotation: Number of input orbit files

shape.name: numberOfInputTecFiles
shape.annotation: Number of input total electon content (TEC) files

shape.name: numberOfInputConfigFiles
shape.annotation: Number of input configuration files
